item.title: 投资者正寄望印度预算案能带来灵丹妙药
item.description: 欧盟与印度的贸易协议对市场提振作用有限。【原文：EU-India trade deal brings little cheer for markets.】

item.title: 中国白银基金暂停交易，因市场狂热推高溢价
item.description: 中国唯一一只纯银基金周三暂停交易，此前一股疯狂的投资热潮使其溢价大幅超过其基础资产价值。【原文：China’s only pure-play silver fund halted trading on Wednesday, after a frenzied wave of investment drove its premium significantly above the value of its underlying assets.】

item.title: 明治安田保险集团准备在3月前增持日本超长期债券
item.description: 明治安田人寿保险公司一位高管表示，日本超长期国债提供了极具吸引力的投资机会，该公司目前正寻求合适时机进行购入。【原文：Japan’s super-long government bonds offer attractive investment opportunities, said a senior official at Meiji Yasuda Life Insurance Co., which is now looking for the right time to buy them.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡维持基准利率不变以支持气旋灾后重建
item.description: 斯里兰卡央行连续第四次会议维持基准利率不变，旨在支持经济从去年毁灭性气旋中复苏，同时引导通胀率向目标水平靠拢。【原文：Sri Lanka’s central bank left its benchmark rate unchanged for a fourth straight meeting, as it looks to support the economy’s recovery from a devastating cyclone last year while navigating inflation toward its target.】

item.title: 美国天然气价格下跌，寒潮过后历史性涨势戛然而止
item.description: 周三美国天然气价格在交投清淡中下跌，此前因严寒天气推升供暖需求并扰乱供应而引发的创纪录涨势已告一段落。【原文：US natural gas fell in thin trading on Wednesday, following a record-shattering rally sparked by freezing temperatures that lifted heating demand and disrupted supplies.】

item.title: 日本央行会议纪要暗示对日元汇率影响物价的担忧加剧
item.description: 日本央行部分理事在12月政策会议上讨论时，对日元贬值对物价走势的影响程度日益担忧。该次会议最终决定将基准利率上调至1995年以来的最高水平。【原文：Some Bank of Japan board members expressed rising concern over the extent to which the yen’s depreciation is affecting price trends when they discussed policy in December before deciding at that meeting to raise the benchmark interest rate to the highest since 1995.】

item.title: 1.7万亿美元的股市上涨推动韩国市值超越德国
item.description: 韩国股市市值超越德国，这得益于科技巨头们乘着全球人工智能和机器人技术热潮的东风。【原文：South Korea overtook Germany in stock market value, powered by tech giants riding the global boom in artificial intelligence and robotics.】

item.title: 香港银行将因手续费激增迎来财富"意外之财"，BI称
item.description: 据彭博智库预测，以汇丰控股和中国银行（香港）为首的香港银行今年财富管理费收入有望增长逾20%，主要得益于基金销售、经纪业务收入及银保业务的推动。【原文：Hong Kong banks, led by HSBC Holdings Plc and Bank of China (Hong Kong), could see wealth fees grow more than 20% this year, driven by fund sales, brokerage income and bancassurance, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 印度股市暴跌3600亿美元，莫迪预算案面临更大压力
item.description: 印度股市正面临十年来最糟糕的年度开局，这给总理纳伦德拉·莫迪政府施加了压力，要求其在即将公布的预算案中推出新的经济增长催化剂。【原文：Indian stocks are on track for their worst start to a year in a decade, piling pressure on Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s administration to deliver fresh catalysts for economic growth in the upcoming budget.】

item.title: MSCI暂停印尼指数调整，警示透明度风险
item.description: MSCI将暂停对印尼企业的部分指数调整，直至监管机构解决上市企业股权高度集中引发的担忧，这标志着东南亚最大市场遭遇最新挫折。【原文：MSCI will pause certain index changes for Indonesian companies until regulators address concerns over the tightly held ownership of listed firms, marking the latest setback for Southeast Asia’s biggest market.】

item.title: 日本官员片山称必要时将与美国协调外汇政策
item.description: 日本财务大臣表示，政府将在必要时与美国协调，继续应对汇率波动。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister said the government will coordinate with the US when necessary as they continue to respond to currency moves.】

item.title: 澳大利亚核心通胀率居高不下，加息可能性依然存在
item.description: 澳大利亚核心通胀率上季度仍居高不下，表明价格压力并未以预期速度缓解，这为澳大利亚储备银行提供了进一步证据，表明利率可能需要进一步上调。【原文：Australia’s core inflation remained elevated last quarter, suggesting price pressures aren’t abating at the desired pace and providing the Reserve Bank with further evidence that interest rates may need to move higher.】

item.title: 报道称软银正洽谈向OpenAI追加300亿美元投资
item.description: 软银集团正与OpenAI商讨追加投资高达300亿美元的事宜，这一大幅增资计划彰显了创始人孙正义在人工智能发展领域扮演核心角色的雄心。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. is in discussions to invest as much as $30 billion more in OpenAI, a sharp increase in commitment that reflects founder Masayoshi Son’s ambitions to play a central role in developing artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 印度预算将借款规模提升至历史新高，考验债券收益率
item.description: 印度交易员正为政府债券发行量创纪录的一年做准备，这可能使该国1.3万亿美元债券市场的借贷成本居高不下。【原文：Indian traders are bracing for a year of record government debt supply, which may keep borrowing costs elevated in the nation’s $1.3 trillion bond market.】

item.title: 信越化学股价暴跌，因美国经济担忧拖累盈利预期
item.description: 信越化学公司股价一度下跌10%，此前该公司业绩未达预期，市场对其在美国聚氯乙烯业务的担忧加剧。【原文：Shin-Etsu Chemical Co.’s shares dropped as much as 10% after it missed earnings estimates amid concerns about its polyvinyl chloride business in the US.】

item.title: 芝加哥商品交易所上调白银保证金，因价格在疯狂上涨中屡创新高
item.description: 芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group）在白银期货价格本周飙升至历史新高后，上调了纽约商品交易所（Comex）白银期货的保证金要求。【原文：CME Group is raising margins on Comex silver futures after prices surged to a record high this week.】

item.title: 新加坡首席执行官家族从重磅IPO中斩获12亿美元财富
item.description: 拉温德·萨杰万在硅谷职业生涯初期，每两天就透支掉信用卡每月3000美元的额度，为一系列科技初创公司奔波打拼。【原文：In Ravinder Sajwan’s early Silicon Valley career, he blew through his $3,000 monthly credit card limit every two days hustling on a series of tech startups.】

item.title: 泰达币正以巨量金属储备撼动黄金市场
item.description: 瑞士境内约有37万座核掩体，这些冷战时期的遗留设施如今鲜少启用。然而其中一座却正呈现出一派繁忙景象。【原文：There are roughly 370,000 nuclear bunkers in Switzerland, a legacy of the Cold War that are now rarely used. One of them, though, is a hive of activity.】

item.title: 英国贵族警告：英国人面临养老金遗产税罚款
item.description: 英国议员警告称，丧亲的英国家庭在努力筹集资金支付养老金的新遗产税时，可能面临因未缴遗产税而被加征惩罚性利息的风险。【原文：Bereaved British families risk being saddled with penal interest bills on unpaid inheritance tax as they struggle to raise the cash to cover new death duties on pension funds, UK lawmakers warned.】

item.title: 美联储料将维持利率不变，官员普遍支持此举
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔本周可能试图将关注点重新转向经济，此前美国央行连续三次降息后，市场普遍预期其将维持利率不变。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell may try to direct attention back to the economy this week, with the US central bank widely expected to hold interest rates steady after three straight reductions.】

item.title: ADM将支付4000万美元以了结美国证交会会计欺诈调查
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周二表示，阿彻丹尼尔米德兰公司已同意支付4000万美元，以解决该机构对其前高管为完成公司目标而试图虚增业绩不佳业务部门利润的指控。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. agreed to pay $40 million to settle US Securities and Exchange Commission allegations that former executives sought to boost a flailing business unit’s bottom line to meet company targets, the regulator said Tuesday.】

item.title: 油价徘徊于四个月高点附近，美元疲软与伊朗风险成支撑
item.description: 油价在美元暴跌后维持在16周高点附近，交易员同时密切关注美国总统特朗普对伊朗的威胁言论。【原文：Oil held near a 16-week high after the dollar slumped, while traders also monitored US President Donald Trump’s threats against Iran.】

item.title: 金价七日连涨后暂歇，交易员消化创纪录涨势
item.description: 金价在连续七日上涨后趋稳，交易员们正消化这场由美元疲软及避开主权债券和货币引发的破纪录涨势。【原文：Gold steadied after seven days of gains, with traders digesting a record-breaking rally fueled by US dollar weakness and a flight from sovereign bonds and currencies.】

item.title: 新加坡将举行货币政策会议，释放转向鹰派信号
item.description: 新加坡央行预计将连续第三次维持政策不变，但经济学家认为，随着通胀出现加速迹象，央行存在转向鹰派政策的空间。【原文：Singapore’s central bank is expected to hold policy settings steady for a third straight review, though economists see scope for a hawkish pivot as inflation shows signs of gaining momentum.】

item.title: 策略师称亚洲外汇市场将最受益于特朗普对美元的影响
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普总统表示不认为美元贬值过度，此番言论加速了关于可能采取协同行动使全球储备货币贬值的讨论。【原文：President Donald Trump’s comments that he didn’t think the dollar had weakened excessively have accelerated a debate about a possible concerted move to depreciate the world’s reserve currency.】

item.title: 美元在美联储会议前下跌，股市黄金上涨：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股指期货随美股同步上涨，强劲的企业盈利提振了市场情绪；与此同时，在美联储1月政策会议前夕，美元延续跌势。【原文：Asian equity-index futures rose alongside US stocks as robust corporate earnings firmed sentiment, while the dollar extended its slump ahead of the Federal Reserve’s January policy meeting.】

item.title: 英国承诺全民人工智能培训以把握1930亿美元机遇
item.description: 英国科技大臣利兹·肯德尔承诺为所有英国工人提供人工智能培训，政府正积极拥抱这项被认为每年可推动经济产出增长1400亿英镑（1930亿美元）的技术。【原文：Technology Secretary Liz Kendall promised to offer training in artificial intelligence for all UK workers as the government seeks to embrace a technology that it said has the potential to boost economic output by £140 billion ($193 billion) a year.】

item.title: 股市飙升推高养老金，但私募市场风险上升
item.description: 标普全球公司表示，若本财年前六个月的投资收益能在未来六个月持续，美国公共养老金或能支付近90%的承诺福利，但风险也在攀升。【原文：US public pensions could pay almost 90% of promised benefits if investment gains made in the first half of the fiscal year persist over the next six months, but risks are also climbing, according to S&P Global Inc.】

item.title: 据称，标准航空的投资者正寻求通过出售股份筹集16亿美元资金。
item.description: 据知情人士透露，标准航空公司（StandardAero Inc.）的两名最大股东正计划通过发行这家飞机维修服务提供商的股票，筹集高达16亿美元的资金。【原文：A pair of StandardAero Inc.’s largest shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $1.6 billion in an offering of the aircraft maintenance services provider’s shares, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 越南银行因债务担保激增而暗藏风险
item.description: 越南贷款机构正提供更多担保以覆盖借款人偿债不足的情况，这促使部分评级机构警告称，这个全球增长最快的经济体之一存在隐性风险。【原文：Vietnamese lenders are providing more pledges to cover borrowers if they fall short paying back debt, prompting some rating firms to warn of hidden risks in one of the world’s fastest-growing economies.】
